description: dark brown coat with navy shoulder piece and light blue collar; brown reinforcement trim on armpits, neckline, and bottoms of sleeve openings; double button and loop closure on front waist, two exterior and one interior button and loop closure on neckline; six faded, white characters on front chest and faded white seal on back center
markings: interior UR, Thomas Murray Collection label: JAP 6215
medium: Cloth: mulberry paper; hemp, buffalo horn, indigo dye, persimmon tannin
title: Traveling coat of paper (kamiko dōchūgi)
